name: Vessel Labyrinth
description:
Game for spooktober game jam. You're a ghost who has escaped your grave. You must navigate through a labyrinth of a grave yard where you will find other entities that want to take you back. You can find humans and possess them, possession lasts only 5 seconds, then they die. Will you sacrifice your afterlife or the life of others?

Keys:

Move - (W,A,S,D

Possess - Space

Graphics: Jones, Mr. Greek

Audio: I Have No Mouth

Programming: Ryuu_365
